评论概述: TINY, but cute. Exchanging for a MUCH larger size.
评论详情: I ordered my standard size, women's XL, but the sweater is tiny... Like middle schooler TINY. The quality and color are good, but it wouldn't even fit my 10-year old niece. I am returning (minus the shipping fee - grr) and reordering a 4XL as I will need a layer underneath. I have never ordered anything above a 2XL in my life, but the sweater is cute. Crossing my fingers. 🤞

Nice but the picture is misleading. I got the silver which should have fox faces around the neck. It’s an attractive design, but you can’t tell what it’s supposed to be. Asian sizing; I ordered a 5X and it is an 1X/2X in American sizes.
Very stylish and love warm colors with complementary colors  Lightweight wool.  Size is a bit small so if you like over sized choose larger size

I was very apprehensive about getting this sweater. It came in directly from China, and they like to sell us their out-takes and rejects for full price. Anyway, it came today and I found it to be surprisingly nice: very substantial with good quality yarn; not thin at all. This is a great knock-about sweater for winter warmth. You could wear this with jeans for raking leaves, grocery shopping, studying for school, or hobbies like watercolor painting.  It is 100% polyester and is lovely to the touch; not scratchy. The directions say dry clean but maybe you could hand wash with Castille liquid soap, and hand block it. The main body color is an army green with black, Egyptian blue, some medium gray, and florettes of kaki. This is a boatneck sweater that doesn't really have a designated back or front. My only complaint is the fit. I usually wear a 1x, but given Asian sizing, I ordered a 2x and it is still a close fit, but not uncomfortable. Also, I believe it will stretch out a bit with wear and use. It you want or need a good workhorse knock about winter sweater and order a size or two up, depending on how loose you like your clothing, this is a good option. I plan on wearing this a lot.

评论概述: Runs very small but it is beautiful
评论详情: Soooo pretty but I suggest buying two sizes larger than what you wear.
The sweater color is bright orange, not the muted pictured and the pattern doesn't quite match up. Took forever to ship and is questionable quality. Do not recommend.

评论概述: Not exactly as pictured but surprisingly nice
评论详情: The sweater pictured had a looser knit with some fuzziness to it. The sweater that arrived was not fuzzy and a tighter knit. That said the color block was gorgeous and cut of the sweater was very flattering. It looks more expensive than it is and while the knit is not cotton it feels pretty good. I would recommend.  I ordered a 3X and I would say it fit like a US L

Color is gorgeous - the fit is nice. Very happy with this purchase, cute with jeans and sneakers or dressed up with trousers and loafers for work.Difficult to choose a color!! Soft, comfortable material. Fit us true to size. Definitely recommend this sweater!
This sweater is easy to care for and holds up well after washing. The colors remain vibrant and the shape stays intact.
Love this sweater(s), well-made and comfortable.
I love this sweater. The material, fit, color, and everything about it is perfect. I order it in 3 more colors.
Runs small, but is cute
Nice and light sweater. Fits good. I ordered a small. I’m 5’7 and about 145lbs.
Not scratchy, pretty pattern, and good fit. Would get more in different colors haha

This sweater is comfortable and lightweight! The color is perfect for fall and winter! I love the pocket on the chest and the texture design of the sweater. Bought this sweater in two colors. True to size and great price!
It’s too warm to wear this yet, but it’s a nice looking and comfortable sweater.

评论概述: Runs small- get a size larger.
评论详情: It's a comfortable, warm and Very nice sweater. However, it does run a size small in my opinion so buy a size larger for more comfortability.

Cannot believe the quality of this sweater! Like the best hand made style you’d ever imagine from a long lost aunt or grandmother’s skill. Incredible price & very soft & comfortable. True to size. Wish I could justify every color choice of this sweater!
Lightweight: Despite its excellent insulation properties, the sweater is very lightweight, not causing a heavy burden, and can be worn all day without feeling tired.
You can feel the quality of the cashmere. This is a must-have for winter!
I never want to take off this sweater. It is so comfortable and feels like a warm hug.
The sweater is very high-end looking & feeling! Generous sizing but not over-sized. Super soft. Love it!

Colors are bright! Relly Love this sweater- it’s soft,comfortable,and can be styled so many ways.Well made and not too thick.I paired it with jeans and boots.This has quickly become my favorite sweater! Would absolutely buy again.
High Cost-Effectiveness: While the price is slightly higher, considering its premium materials and long-lasting durability, it offers great value for money and is a worthwhile investment.
Purchased as a gift for my mum who loves mushrooms. Cute!!
Love the look and feel of this sweater! It looks great paired with jeans and sneakers or booties!
Glad to wear
The color is cute, and the thickness is just right, perfect as a base layer or for casual home wear.
